node.html: Unity practice project to create session and application based data persistence.
Sumo styled mini game. This project focused on experimenting with wave based difficulty increases and the implementation of power ups for the User. This project part of the Unity Programmer track.

frontmatter.title: Clicky Food - Fruit Ninja Type Clone

node.html: Fruit ninja type clone. This project focused on experimenting on Unity UI development, changing between game states, and implementing difficulty options. This project was built as part of the Unity Programmer track.
Simple application that leverages the yelp api to help a user best find what to eat in their location. Project developed through the Codecademy web development track.
Simple application that leverages the Spotify api to allow a user to fetch and save playlists. Project developed through the Codecademy web development track.
A starter framework for getting a page object model Cypress framework started for automated testing.
This is the base framework for a Page Object Model format using Selenium and Python.
Initial personal project to learn how to create enemy following patterns, and a potential endless survival mode.
